meanings.definition: Capable of being reconciled or resolved.
meanings.sent1: Their differences were reconcilable after a calm discussion.
meanings.sent2: The two friends had a reconcilable argument and quickly made up.
meanings.sent3: It was a reconcilable mistake that they both laughed about later.
meanings.sent4: The conflicting schedules were surprisingly reconcilable with some adjustments.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces were so reconcilable that they fit perfectly together.

meanings.sent1: The two roommates had a reconcilable living arrangement.
meanings.sent2: In the peaceful garden, various plants were reconcilable and thrived together.
meanings.sent3: The cats and dogs found a reconcilable way to share the sunny spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: The different music tastes of the group were surprisingly reconcilable during the road trip.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the painting were so reconcilable that they created a beautiful harmony.

meanings.sent1: Her actions were not reconcilable with her words, causing confusion.
meanings.sent2: The data from both experiments were reconcilable and supported the theory.
meanings.sent3: The mismatched socks were reconcilable in a quirky fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: Their personalities were so different yet reconcilable in their shared goals.
meanings.sent5: The flavors in the dish were perfectly reconcilable, creating a delicious blend.
